name: jackson
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital and the largest city of the US state of Mississippi: Holder tested positive for the virus in 1993 when entering the state prison in Jackson. Cleanup efforts in Jackson are expected to run into the tens of millions of dollars.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Jackson.He spent five years working as a nurse in Jackson.Delta began its first passenger flights from Dallas to Jackson, Miss. in 1929.His father is retired law enforcement and his brother is a police officer in Jackson, Mississippi.Dana Bash is on the scene for us, joining us from Jackson.
